name: Boiling House
description:
This is a game where you play as a slave in a boiling house, stirring and skimming hot sugar cane liquid before pouring it into a chute and repeating. This is one of many tasks that slaves had to do to produce sugar, which was a tedious and physically draining process. In this game, we hope to convey this part in a way that emphasizes the cruel nature that slaves went through.
